activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#13170
activity.text:
**Problem:**
Currently, the <AlertDialog> for confirming the clearing of favorites exists in the ValueSetSelect component, but there is no effective way to trigger it from within the ValueSetSearchContent component where the star button resides.

**Proposed Solution**

- Add an optional onClearFavourites callback prop to the ValueSetSearchContent component.
- In the ValueSetSelect component, pass () => setIsClearingFavourites(true) as the value for this prop.
- Modify the onFavourite logic in ValueSetSearchContent to call onClearFavourites() instead of directly invoking removeFavouriteMutation.mutate(), thereby deferring the removal to after confirmation.

**ETA:** EOD

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#13093
activity.text:
@Jacobjeevan, @rithviknishad, I would like to work on the issue.

**Proposed solution**

- I will introduce a findMatchingPaths utility that identifies all matching location nodes and builds the full path (from root to match) using a parentMap.
- All location IDs in these paths are stored in a Set and applied to the expandedLocations state, ensuring that the tree expands all parent nodes necessary to reveal the match.
- Also reset the expandedLocations state to an empty set when the search input is cleared, collapsing the tree back to its default state.

**ETA:** 1 day

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12918
activity.text:
@rithviknishad @Jacobjeevan, could you assign me this issue. 

**Proposed solution**

- The issue is due to not pushing allergy entries into the grouped object during reduction. 
- Add the missing push() inside the reducer to correctly populate the grouped structure, enabling proper rendering of the allergy list.

**ETA:** EOD

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12736
activity.text:
@AdityaJ2305 @rithviknishad I would like to work on the issue

Proposed Solution:

- Replace the native <select> in the user profile language selector with ShadCN's Select component to maintain consistency with the design system. This will involve importing ShadCN Select, updating the JSX structure, ensuring language switching still works via i18next, and preserving existing className props for styling.

ETA: 1 Day from assignment
